Answers.MP Summary: Control the systemd system and service manager
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_1241842: GUI crashes after uninstalling KDE Plama
Top-3 Scripts:
au_1241842: sudo systemctl disable sddm
# or
sudo apt remove sddm

sudo systemctl restart gdm

sudo systemctl enable --now gdm

Explanations about Options.--now:
When used with enable, the units will also be started. When used with disable or mask,
 the units will also be stopped. The start or stop operation is only carried out when
 the respective enable or disable operation has been successful.
